alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN JOHNSON AND NORTHEASTERN WASHAKIE COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM MDT... At 528 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dullknife Reservoir, which is also 12 miles east of Ten Sleep, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Powder River Pass and Dullknife Reservoir around 535 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between mile markers 278 and 299. Interstate 90 between mile markers 46 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
